r.s: A Web front end for PEAR_PackageUpdate
r.d:
PEAR_PackageUpdate (PPU) is designed to allow developers to easily include auto updating features for other packages and PEAR installable applications.
PEAR_PackageUpdate_Web is a HTML web front end for PPU.
r.n:
* fixed dependencies: - required at least PHP 4.3.0 due to usage of function: file_get_contents and also because PPU used itself php 4.3.0 as minimum version
- use now the latest QuickForm 3.2.6
